entry.tran: (地理学上)汇流，径流，集水；汇流的水
entry.def: In geography, catchment is the process of collecting water, in particular the process of water flowing from the ground and collecting in a river. Catchment is also the water that is collected in this way.

means.word_mean: 1. a structure in which water is collected
